ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Yunus too was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Verily Jonah is one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And Jonah too was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed Yunus is one of the Noble Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, Yunus was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And Yunus was most surely of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Jonah too was one of the Envoys;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! Jonah verily was of those sent (to warn)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Jonah too was one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily Yunus was Of the sent ones.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed Jonah was one of the apostles.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So also was Jonah among those sent (by Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And, verily, Yunus (Jonah) was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Jonah, too, was one of the Messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And Jonah was one of the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, Jonah was among the messengers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:139] And indeed Jonah was one of the messengers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! Jonah verily was of those sent (to warn)) his folk,
